root.name: Spirou
root.description: Spirou is an obscure 2D side-scrolling platformer designed by Infogrames based on a popular Belgian comic. Spirou is a bumbling bellboy who looks like he could be Tintin's younger brother. In Spirou, you task is to rescue the world-famous scientist Count Champaignac from the clutches of an evil organization intent on using his latest invention to take over the world. Both games has colorful cartoony graphics with fluid animation and incorporates funny antics. The game is similar to Pitfall, Jungle Book, or any of Infogrames' other licensed cartoon platformers (most notably the Tintin series) Â The game was released on the PC and Snes as well as the original Gameboy. There was a Game Gear version being developed but was abandoned.
